price: 48. Kaadu sin kee sin Yallittey Yallak kalah taqbudeenik baxsimeyyooh inni diini luk siinik axxeereyyo anu siinit aba fayu cinteenik, kaadu anu inni Rabbi kallaceyyo anu inni Rabbit aba kallacit uma num akkewaam qaagita kaal esseram yoh cinaamak.
arabic: وَأَعۡتَزِلُكُمۡ وَمَا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّي شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-aʿtazilukum wamā tadʿūna min dūni al-lahi wa-adʿū rabbī ʿasā allā akūna biduʿāi rabbī shaqiyyan
